text: So, that means that #Hydroxychloroquine has been available in #India, too, over the counter... we need to look at every country where people can easily access #chloroquine, and see if their numbers for #COVID19 recovery are much higher, and the 'news' has to stop dissing it🤨🤔 https://t.co/XkOQCDUtZh https://t.co/B1Lo1QNLgi
